title: Arabian Nights
summary: Enjoy the illustration of the mountain in the nights of Arabia.
developerAddress: House # 616, Street # 69, Sector I-8/3, Islamabad, Pakistan.
description: Desert nights and view of the mountain reminds of the cold weather and adventurous time, when the night is laying upon the surroundings. The illustration design is used in this watch face. The dim light colors themes signifying the night time. This watch face has digital time and Arabic font is used of the time and date. When the watch is not in use the watch face goes into ambient mode which saves the battery just by showing the time.
descriptionHTML: Desert nights and view of the mountain reminds of the cold weather and adventurous time, when the night is laying upon the surroundings. The illustration design is used in this watch face. The dim light colors themes signifying the night time. This watch face has digital time and Arabic font is used of the time and date. When the watch is not in use the watch face goes into ambient mode which saves the battery just by showing the time.
